segments.text: I notice the cookie jar is wide open, and the boy is reaching inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that stool like it’s nothing, but it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for her share, and she looks so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to end up on the floor if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and they’re too busy to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe their mom hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught doing this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, her face full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is all going to end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
